# dokploy_destination (Data Source)

Fetches a single Dokploy backup destination by its ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the destination.

### Read-Only

- `access_key` (String) Access key for the storage provider.
- `bucket` (String) Bucket name for storing backups.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the destination was created.
- `endpoint` (String) Endpoint URL for the storage provider.
- `name` (String) Name of the destination.
- `organization_id` (String) Organization ID the destination belongs to.
- `region` (String) Region where the bucket is located.
- `server_id` (String) Server ID for remote server destinations.
- `storage_provider` (String) Storage provider type (e.g., 'aws-s3', 'minio').
